attributes.action: publicly condemn the Israeli government's illegal and barbarous attack on Gaza. We call on our goverment to demand that Israel stop these attacks now and to lift the illegal blockade on Gaza ! We also call on the UK government to place an arms embargo on Israel and to use the strongest diplomatic means to achieve these goals.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The purpose of this petition is to lobby the British government to do all it can to help bring about an immediate halt to Israel's criminal attacks on Gaza.

The UK, US and other governments sell arms to Israel and provide practical support to it. Therefore we in Britain and other countries have a role to play in making sure that we do not aid and abet Israel's brutal attacks. We need to support peace in the Middle east for all the people there !

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
